original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.Score=1 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-27 14:12:07' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.VoteTypeId=5 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-19 10:32:13' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 1 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-27 14:12:07'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 5 AND (CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 00:00:00')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-19 10:32:13'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
